overview: LIAM, a goofy dad and country veterinarian has hit a milestone - the big 40. His morning dreams of being spoilt by his seductive wife are dashed as a controversial nude painting steals his spotlight. Teased by a bohemian horse trainer and an obnoxious duck, Liam's jealousy fuelled imagination sparks a risqu√© scheme to steal it back.
title: Centrepiece
